category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DesignContext_Type_Name_Query_lookup_string
preference.preference_description: This is used for defining the look-up string corresponding to the saved query to find - EngChange Revisions (if "PortalDesignContextECObject.TYPE" defines a type other than an ItemRevision type), - Variant rules referenced on QPL search indexes, and/or - Workflow processes by "Type" and "Name" entries. The default search used by DesignContext is "General...", which corresponds to the lookup string "k_find_general_name". The Saved Query corresponding to this string is looked up from TC_ROOT/lang/textserver/<language>/qry_text_locale.xml file. If the User desires to use a separate Query for this purpose, the user should ensure that the query corresponds to the String defined for the following Preference and that it contains entries for "Type" and "Name".
